queryParameters.name: after
queryParameters.description: Return entities after the specified cursor. Used for working through paginated results.

queryParameters.name: id
queryParameters.description: Return only the IDs specified. Use a comma separated list to get multiple entities.

queryParameters.name: include
queryParameters.description: Include related entities in the response.

product.description: Include an object with the product related to this price.

queryParameters.name: order_by
queryParameters.description: Order returned entities by the specified field and direction (`[ASC]` or `[DESC]`).

queryParameters.name: per_page
queryParameters.description: Set how many entities are returned per page.

queryParameters.name: product_id
queryParameters.description: Return entities related to the specified product. Use a comma separated list to specify multiple product IDs.

queryParameters.name: status
queryParameters.description: Return entities that match the specified status. Use a comma separated list to specify multiple status values.

active.description: Return entities where the status is `active`. Returned entities can be used in Paddle and are returned when listing entities.

archived.description: Return entities where the status is `archived`. Returned entities can't be used for billing and aren't returned when listing entities.

queryParameters.name: recurring
queryParameters.description: Determine whether returned entities are for recurring prices (`true`) or one-time prices (`false`).

bodyParameters.name: product_id
bodyParameters.description: Paddle ID for the product that this price is for, prefixed with `pro_`.

bodyParameters.name: description
bodyParameters.description: Short description for this price. Typically describes how often the related product bills.

bodyParameters.name: billing_cycle
bodyParameters.description: How often this price should be charged. `null` if price is non-recurring (one-time).

bodyParameters.name: trial_period
bodyParameters.description: Trial period for the product related to this price. The billing cycle begins once the trial period is over. `null` for no trial period. Requires `billing_cycle`.

account_setting.description: Prices use the setting from your account.

schema.description: Base price. This price applies to all customers, except for customers located in countries where you have `unit_price_overrides`.

amount.description: Amount in the lowest denomination for the currency, e.g. 10 USD = 1000 (cents).

schema.description: List of unit price overrides. Use to override the base price with a custom price and currency for a country or group of countries.

country_codes.description: Supported two-letter ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code. Customers located in the listed countries are charged the override price.

items.title: Country code
items.description: Supported two-letter ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code.

unit_price.title: Money
unit_price.description: Override price. This price applies to customers located in the countries for this unit price override.

amount.description: Amount in the lowest denomination for the currency, e.g. 10 USD = 1000 (cents).

quantity.title: price_quantity

minimum.description: Minimum quantity of the product related to this price that can be bought. Required if `maximum` set.

maximum.description: Maximum quantity of the product related to this price that can be bought. Required if `minimum` set. Must be greater than the `minimum` value.

quantity.description: Limits on how many times the related product can be purchased at this price. Useful for discount campaigns.

status.title: Status
status.description: Whether this entity can be used in Paddle.

active.description: Entity is active and can be used.

archived.description: Entity is archived, so can't be used.

queryParameters.name: include
queryParameters.description: Include related entities in the response.

prices.description: Include an array of prices related to this product.

pathParameters.name: product_id
pathParameters.description: Paddle ID of the product entity to work with.

bodyParameters.name: tax_category
bodyParameters.description: Tax category for this product. Used for charging the correct rate of tax. Selected tax category must be enabled on your Paddle account.

digital-goods.description: Non-customizable digital files or media (not software) acquired with an up front payment that can be accessed without any physical product being delivered.

ebooks.description: Digital books and educational material which is sold with permanent rights for use by the customer.

implementation-services.description: Remote configuration, set-up, and integrating software on behalf of a customer.

professional-services.description: Services that involve the application of your expertise and specialized knowledge of a software product.

saas.description: Products that allow users to connect to and use online or cloud-based applications over the Internet.

software-programming-services.description: Services that can be used to customize and white label software products.

standard.description: Software products that are pre-written and can be downloaded and installed onto a local device.

training-services.description: Training and education services related to software products.

website-hosting.description: Cloud storage service for personal or corporate information, assets, or intellectual property.

bodyParameters.name: image_url
bodyParameters.description: Image for this product. Included in the checkout and on some customer documents.

bodyParameters.name: status
bodyParameters.description: Whether this entity can be used in Paddle.

active.description: Entity is active and can be used.

archived.description: Entity is archived, so can't be used.

pathParameters.name: product_id
pathParameters.description: Paddle ID of the product entity to work with.
